text: Currently nesting moduleâ€™s inside of each other is not supported. There would be no way to edit the field values of the nested module. The work-around you stated is probably the best path.

We are actively thinking about ways to provide sections that can contain modules, enabling you to create some more complicated layouts with similar functionality. This is a complicated problem and we want to ensure we get it right for both content creators and developers.
Did something change about .svg file uploads? public url is no longer available.
